definition: a device consisting of a flat or curved piece (as a metal plate) so that its surface reacts to the water it is passing through, cover or back with foil
details:
noun
- a device consisting of a flat or curved piece (as a metal plate) so that its surface reacts to the water it is passing through
= example: a device consisting of a flat or curved piece (as a metal plate) so that its surface reacts to the water it is passing through
= synonyms: hydrofoil
- anything that serves by contrast to call attention to another thing's good qualities
= example: anything that serves by contrast to call attention to another thing's good qualities
= synonyms: enhancer
- a light slender flexible sword tipped by a button
- a piece of thin and flexible sheet metal
= example: a piece of thin and flexible sheet metal
- picture consisting of a positive photograph or drawing on a transparent base
= synonyms: transparency
verb
- cover or back with foil
= example: cover or back with foil
- hinder or prevent (the efforts, plans, or desires) of
= synonyms: spoil
- enhance by contrast
= example: enhance by contrast
